overview: Tegar, a person with a disability. Having only one leg and no arms, Tegar doesn't get enough love from his parents. Tegar's father left him and his mother was busy working. The only person who loves Tegar with all his heart is Grandpa. Once upon a time when Tegar was forced to live a life outside of himself, Mother had to work in the city and her nurse had to leave her.
title: Tegar
